name: Infinity Loop
description:
Where are you? … You don’t know … Why are you here? … You don’t know either … In this maze of corridors where traps and enemy are present, only a voice echoes in your head. That of the Narrator. He will tell you his story in this place and help you understand how to escape from this infinite place.

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/47/infinty-loop
